text: Læa tha cea tham phwk khea wa khır pen phu srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin nænxn phwk khea ca klaw wa xallxhˌ cng klaw theid(muhammad)phwk than mi hen dxk hrux wa sing thi phwk than wingwxn khx xun ca kxallxhˌ nan ha kxallxhˌ thrng prasngkh ca hı mi khwam thukkh yak kæ chan læw phwk man ca pldpeluxng khwam thukkh yak khxng phraxngkh di him? Hrux hak phraxngkh prasngkh ca hı khwam metta kæ chan phwk man ca yabyang khwam metta khxng phraxngkh di him? Cng klaw theid(muhammad) xallxhˌ thrng phx pheiyng kæ chan læw phraxngkh theanan brrda phu mxb khwam wi wangcı ca hı khwam wi wangcı
